# Prompts Directory

⚠️ **IMPORTANT NOTICE** ⚠️

## DO NOT MODIFY FILES IN THIS DIRECTORY

The files in this directory are managed by the [ai-coding-workflow](https://bitbucket.org/reflexmediainc/ai-coding-workflow/src/master/) repository and will be automatically overwritten during the next sync operation. Any local changes you make to these files will be lost.

If you need to modify these prompt files, please make your changes in the [ai-coding-workflow](https://bitbucket.org/reflexmediainc/ai-coding-workflow/src/master/) repository instead, and they will be synchronized to this project during the next sync.

## Files in this directory

- `commit.prompt.md` - Commit prompt configuration
- `evaluate.prompt.md` - Evaluation prompt configuration
- `implement.prompt.md` - Implementation prompt configuration
- `plan.prompt.md` - Planning prompt configuration
- `review.prompt.md` - Review prompt configuration
